name: Circle the Sun: simple arcade game
name_original: Circle the Sun: simple arcade game
description:
Circle the sun: spin the sun to hit the ball and score the best! Light and simple arcade game, addictive and fun! 

Special Features
Multiplayer! - show your skills
Challenge Friends - share your score online!
Achievements - unlock new levels!
 Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Circle the Sun is completely free to play! Start spinning!

WHAT'S NEW
To all our fans! This one is a big one! A lot of new features just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
